Marc Edelman Papers TAM 427

Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Marc Edelman in 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 2008.003.
Historical/Biographical Note
Marc Edelman was involved in various progressive organizations, particularly the New York Civil Liberties Union and Reelpolitik (a Columbia University film collective).
Scope and Contents
This small collection contains flyers and correspondence concerning organizations Marc Edelman was involved in, particularly the New York Civil Liberties Union and Reelpolitik (a Columbia University film collective). Also included is one file containing correspondence regarding a student riot at the High School of Music and Art and an issue of the Washington Free Press dealing with Students for a Democratic Society (SDS) action against the Pentagon.
